Holy sh- do I love the story for this game. Stop reading and just buy it. It's totally worth the money and the community levels are great. I usually have a hard time finding good steam workshop builds on other games but it was so easy to find them for Portal 2. Buy this game its awesome.

Literally my favorite game of all time. The story is fun to figure out as you go along and the puzzles are extremely entertaining and confusing at times. Portal and Portal 2 are some of, if not, the best games ever made
